hydration: Most adults need 2–3 liters of water daily.
sleep: Aim for 7–9 hours of sleep each night.
stress: Try deep breathing to reduce stress.
tired: You may be stressed or lack sleep, try asking Finn about either.
eat: Aim for a balanced diet of fruits and vegetables, grains, healthy fats, etc.
exercise: Adults should try to get at least 30 minutes of exercise every day.
